name: part_005
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ3周年記念LIVE】MIX2 - 私の居場所 - 【3DLIVE】 [knb_mosTUvo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Polka Omaru performing 'Ever Blue'.
Guest reveal screen for Nekomata Okayu.
Tokoyami Towa and Nekomata Okayu performing 'Lazyroop'.

subtitles.original: 不自然もない 心の鏡は曇っている
subtitles.english: Nothing is unnatural; the mirror of my heart is clouded.

subtitles.original: 脱ぎ捨てた服さえ余所余所しい
subtitles.english: Even the clothes I threw off feel like a stranger.

subtitles.original: ここは底なしの海
subtitles.english: This is a bottomless sea.

subtitles.original: 悲しくはない
subtitles.english: I'm not sad.

subtitles.original: 苦しくもない
subtitles.english: I'm not in pain.

subtitles.original: さみしくもない
subtitles.english: I'm not lonely.

subtitles.original: 悲しくない 苦しくくない さみしくない
subtitles.english: Not sad, not in pain, not lonely.

subtitles.original: 悲しくない 苦しくない さみしくない
subtitles.english: Not sad, not in pain, not lonely.

subtitles.original: ああ もう うるさいな
subtitles.english: Ah, it's so noisy now.

subtitles.original: うおーー
subtitles.english: Woah—

subtitles.original: どこまでも沈む
subtitles.english: Sinking forever,

subtitles.original: 神さまでさえ見つけられないくらい
subtitles.english: deep enough that even God can't find me.

subtitles.original: 深く 深く 沈んでいく
subtitles.english: Deeper and deeper I sink,

subtitles.original: なまぬるい熱帯夜
subtitles.english: through this lukewarm tropical night.

subtitles.original: 乾いた体温に響くレクイエム
subtitles.english: A requiem echoing in dry body temperature.

subtitles.original: 世界が私だけを置いていく
subtitles.english: The world is leaving me behind.

subtitles.original: 泡になってなくなるなんて 美しい終わりはきっとこない
subtitles.english: A beautiful end like turning into foam won't ever come.

subtitles.original: 魂一つままならないし 世界は不完全で果てがないもの
subtitles.english: Even a single soul is unmanageable; the world is imperfect and endless.

subtitles.original: 濡れて張り付いた孤独が冷え切って
subtitles.english: The wet, clinging loneliness has frozen over,

subtitles.original: いつまでも私を雁字搦めにしている
subtitles.english: keeping me bound forever.

subtitles.original: この薄暗い胎に佇んだ
subtitles.english: Standing in this dim womb,

subtitles.original: 永遠の終わらせ方を知らないまま
subtitles.english: still not knowing how to end eternity.

subtitles.original: 揺らいでは夜中 水面解く静寂と証を
subtitles.english: Swaying in the middle of the night, the silence and evidence unraveling on the water's surface.

subtitles.original: 吐いて消そうとしてる 帰れないどこも私が狂っている
subtitles.english: Trying to exhale and erase it; I can't go back anywhere, I'm going crazy.

subtitles.original: かじかんだ身体が離れていく
subtitles.english: My numbed body is drifting away.

subtitles.original: 何も感じたくない もう
subtitles.english: I don't want to feel anything anymore.

subtitles.original: どこまでも落ちる
subtitles.english: Falling forever,

subtitles.original: 朝焼けでさえ照らしきれないように
subtitles.english: so that even the sunrise can't illuminate me.

subtitles.original: 暗く 暗く 溺れていく
subtitles.english: Drowning in the darkness,

subtitles.original: なまぬるい熱帯夜
subtitles.english: this lukewarm tropical night.

subtitles.original: 一ドル銀貨の月さえ見放す
subtitles.english: Even the moon, like a silver dollar coin, abandons me.

subtitles.original: エヴァーブルー 染まっては続く夢なら
subtitles.english: Ever blue; if this dream continues as I'm stained by it,

subtitles.original: 乾いた夜風に燃えるレクイエム
subtitles.english: a requiem burning in the dry night breeze.

subtitles.original: 世界が私だけを置いていく
subtitles.english: The world is leaving me behind.

subtitles.original: NEXT GUEST
subtitles.english: NEXT GUEST

subtitles.original: HOLOLIVE GAMERS
subtitles.english: HOLOLIVE GAMERS

subtitles.original: 猫又おかゆ
subtitles.english: Nekomata Okayu

subtitles.original: 2 MIX
subtitles.english: 2 MIX

subtitles.original: Lazyroop
subtitles.english: Lazyroop

subtitles.original: はあ 日曜日の朝 気分は少しブルー
subtitles.english: Sigh, Sunday morning, feeling a bit blue.

subtitles.original: 今週も終わっちゃうな いや困っちゃうな
subtitles.english: This week is ending too; oh, what a bother.

subtitles.original: やりたいこと山積みだ
subtitles.english: I've got a mountain of things I want to do.

subtitles.original: そうどうやったって来る月曜日
subtitles.english: Yeah, no matter what I do, Monday comes.

subtitles.original: きっと囲まれてんだ鉄格子
subtitles.english: I'm surely surrounded by iron bars.

subtitles.original: いつか解き放たれたい 「でも一人じゃ笑えない」
subtitles.english: I want to be set free someday— "But I can't smile alone."

subtitles.original: 吹き抜ける風と踊った
subtitles.english: I danced with the wind blowing through.

subtitles.original: あぁ 沈む夕日にだって
subtitles.english: Ah, even in the setting sun,

subtitles.original: あぁ 昇る朝日だって
subtitles.english: ah, even in the rising sun,

subtitles.original: あぁ 雨に打たれたって
subtitles.english: ah, even if I'm caught in the rain,

subtitles.original: そばにいられたら
subtitles.english: as long as I can be by your side.

subtitles.original: ループループする毎日が 彩りに溢れてくよ
subtitles.english: These looping days are overflowing with color.

subtitles.original: きっと さんざめく花火のそばに 香る夢のように
subtitles.english: Surely, like a fragrant dream beside the noisy fireworks.

subtitles.original: こんな ループループする毎日が かけがえない宝石のように
subtitles.english: If these looping days feel like irreplaceable jewels,

subtitles.original: 大切に思えるのなら
subtitles.english: if I can hold them dear,

subtitles.original: 週末の夜も愛しいね
subtitles.english: then even the weekend nights are lovely.
